item.description:
Join us on October 16th at Middlesex Community College, Lowell, MA for a day of games and fun- try something new or reconnect with a favorite. Learn about games you've never even heard about with our Speed Gaming Event!

Timeline:

11:30-12:00 Registration, check in, coffee, mingling
12:00-1:30: Speed Gaming- Rotate stations to learn about the RPG and Board Games offered. 5-10 minutes per game, hopefully you'll meet your dream game!
2:00-6:00 Open Gaming: Each RPG will last between 2-4 hours. There are plenty of board games and gm'less games to fill the extra time so we hope you'll get to "date" a few choices!

Role Playing Games
We are still confirming the specific games offered- check Brilliantgameologists.com for updates.
[Want to play something specific or run a game? Contact us ASAP!]

Board Games
Along with the RPGâ€™s will be a collection of board games including Dominion, Race for the Galaxy, Zombies!, Settlers of Catan, Carcassone, Ticket to Ride, Pillars of the Earth, Agricola, Word on the Street,Say Anything, Apples to Apples and many more! If you are counting on a specific game on this list or hope to try one not listed, let us know so we don't forget it!

Location:
Middlesex Community College Lowell- cafeteria
33 Kearney Square, Lowell
Address/ Directions

Parking:
MCC has a parking garage- the Lower Docks Garage off of Warren Street with a walkway to the MCC building. There is also on-street parking, but it is limited.

Registration:
Register by October 10th so we know how many snacks and games to get and prep! On site registration works too, but we may have to do some shuffling so we would love if you register ahead of time!

Admission is free!

If you partake of the snack table, we ask that you contribute $5 to the snack fund. Our organization has quite a few costs associated with this event, our podcast, and website, so additional donations are always appreciated!

Contact and Registration:
To register, confirm here!
Questions? Send an email to gm@brilliantgameologists.com or twitter us at @bg_podcast

Check the website for updated information: [url=http://brilliantgameologists.com/playdate101610/[/url]
Go to BrilliantGameologists.com/Mailer and sign up for the mailing list
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the cafeteria! Follow the signs!
item.name: PlayDate: October 16, Lowell MA
